name: Derek Warwick
introduction: Derek Stanley Arthur Warwick (born August 27, 1954 in New Alresford, Hampshire, United Kingdom) is a former British Formula One driver who competed from 1981 until 1993. Warwick had little success in Formula One but has been regarded by many within the F1 fraternity as one of the best drivers to never have won a race. Since 2010, Warwick has regularly sat on the Stewards panel as the racing driver's representative at a Grand Prix meeting.
